com.snamp

Interface SynchronizationEvent.Awaitor<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Type of the event result.
    Enclosing class:
    SynchronizationEvent<T>

    public static interface SynchronizationEvent.Awaitor<T>
    Represents awaitor of the synchronization event.

    This interface should be used by event consumer.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T await()
      Blocks the caller thread (may be infinitely) until the event will not be raised.
      T await(TimeSpan timeout)
      Blocks the caller thread until the event will not be raised.

    • Method Detail

      • await

        T await(TimeSpan timeout)
        throws java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException,
               java.lang.InterruptedException
        Blocks the caller thread until the event will not be raised.
        Parameters:
        timeout - Event waiting timeout.
        Returns:
        The event data.
        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.TimeoutException - timeout parameter too small for waiting.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Waiting thread is aborted.

      • await

        T await()
        throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Blocks the caller thread (may be infinitely) until the event will not be raised.
        Returns:
        The event data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Waiting thread is aborted.
